name: Henry's Quest: Weather's Wand
description:
Henry's Quest: The Weather's Wand features a boy with a powerful magic wand which can change the weather at anytime. The path won't be easy as you go through flames and frozen ways. Be careful with what you can find changing the enviroment as you may turn into ashes!

You control Henry with simple buttons, arrows(movement) and Z(action). It's a
Plataformer Puzzle where you have to beat all levels to win!

Be free to comment, your opinion is very useful for our future projects! :)

Enjoy!
